nodes.text: Join the Resistance: Books 1–3 is the unabridged audio version of the canon Star Wars: Join the Resistance novel trilogy, written by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker. It includes the books Join the Resistance, Escape from Vodran, and Attack on Starkiller Base. The audiobook was performed by Bradford Hastings and was released by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on October 2, 2018.
